docs: Output signals associated with the circuit

docs: The service provider this belongs to

docs: The circuit associated with this policy

docs: Unique code of the policy (associated with the service)

docs: Timestamp for when the service was registered

fields.name: key
docs: Key that is used for secret sharing encryption.

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority that manages the trustee

fields.name: isVerified
docs: Indicates whether the [Trustee] has been verified

fields.name: revealedShareCount
docs: The number of revealed secret shares

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Timestamp for when the trustee was registered

fields.name: encryptionKey
docs: The key that is used for secret sharing encryption.

fields.name: proofRequestOwner
docs: The public key of the user who owns the [ProofRequest]

fields.name: requiredShareCount
docs: Required number of shares used to reconstruct the secret

fields.name: revealedShareCount
docs: Revealed number of shares used to reconstruct the secret

fields.name: proofRequestOwner
docs: The public key of the user who owns the [ProofRequest]

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Timestamp for when the request was created

fields.name: expiredAt
docs: Timestamp for when the request will expire

fields.name: verifiedAt
docs: Timestamp for when the proof was verified

fields.name: retentionEndDate
docs: Timestamp indicating when the data will no longer be stored

docs: Public inputs that are used to verify the `proof`
